page_content:
![](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/_assets/3137b1a864c689786cac76b3def62dd1/Assets/img/default-banner.jpg)

# Registering a vehicle under the International Registration Plan (IRP)

The page that you wish to see is available in French only.

In accordance with the [SAAQ's language policy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/language-policy), texts and documents intended for SAAQ employees and Québec businesses are only available in French.

[You may consult the French version of the page](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/vehicle-registration/vehicle-international-registration-plan).

Last update: October 23, 2025

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That's why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.

metadata.title: Registering a vehicle under the International Registration Plan (IRP) - SAAQ
metadata.description: Si vous transportez des marchandises ou des personnes à l’extérieur du Québec avec un véhicule lourd, vous devez le faire immatriculer au Régime d’immatriculation international (IRP).
metadata.keywords: IRP; immatriculer, immatriculation, camion, transport routier, marchandise, autobus, IRP, plaque, certificat, routier, international
